name: 428: Shibuya Scramble
summary: A kidnapping on the streets of Shibuya brings together a hot-blooded detective, hard-hitting journalist, former gang leader, the head researcher of a big pharma manufacturer and a part-timer stuck in cat costume for a series of events each more unexpected and outrageous than the last.

name: 420 Button Clicker
summary: The player can add, move and delete buttons on the screen.

name: 42 Ways to Die in Space
summary: Survive in space by dodging strange obstacles in an ever-changing gauntlet and reach the end to defeat entropy. Fly with limited resources, get stronger with upgrades and make the right decisions in this action arena rogue-lite. Warning: there is only 1 way to live but 42 ways to die in space...

name: 420Blaze It 2: Game of the Year
summary: The long awaited sequel to the FPS hit is coming! You will no scope. You will blaze it. You will hallucinate some weird af s*** as you fight and xD inside your mind in 999fps to destroy the Illuminati and rescue the memes. Are you ready for 420BLAZEIT 2????!!1
4294967296 is an unofficial 2048 clone game which has the player aim to get the 4294967296 tile within a 16x16 play field.

name: 42 Space Mayhem
summary: Fast-paced rogue-lite space shooter where every run brings new upgrades, enemy waves, and ship evolutions. Play solo or team up with a friend in co-op to survive, adapt, and dominate the galaxy.
